sourcesContent:
import React, { useState } from 'react'; import { User, CreditCard, Bell, Shield, Palette, Download, Upload, Trash2, Edit3, Save } from 'lucide-react'; import './Settings.css'; interface SettingsProps { onThemeChange: (theme: 'dark' | 'light') => void; currentTheme: 'dark' | 'light'; } const Settings: React.FC = ({ onThemeChange, currentTheme }) => { const [activeTab, setActiveTab] = useState('profile'); const [isEditing, setIsEditing] = useState(false); const [profileData, setProfileData] = useState({ name: 'John Doe', email: 'john.doe@example.com', phone: '+1 (555) 123-4567', location: 'New York, NY', joinDate: 'January 2024' }); const handleSave = () => { setIsEditing(false); // Here you would typically save to backend }; const handleThemeSelect = (theme: 'dark' | 'light') => { onThemeChange(theme); }; const tabs = [ { id: 'profile', label: 'Profile', icon: User }, { id: 'billing', label: 'Billing', icon: CreditCard }, { id: 'notifications', label: 'Notifications', icon: Bell }, { id: 'privacy', label: 'Privacy', icon: Shield }, { id: 'appearance', label: 'Appearance', icon: Palette } ]; return (

Settings

Manage your account and preferences

{tabs.map((tab) => { const Icon = tab.icon; return ( ); })}
{activeTab === 'profile' && (

Profile Information

{profileData.name}

ANITA Premium Member

Member since {profileData.joinDate}
setProfileData({...profileData, name: e.target.value})} disabled={!isEditing} />
setProfileData({...profileData, email: e.target.value})} disabled={!isEditing} />
setProfileData({...profileData, phone: e.target.value})} disabled={!isEditing} />
setProfileData({...profileData, location: e.target.value})} disabled={!isEditing} />
{isEditing && (
)}
)} {activeTab === 'billing' && (

Billing & Subscription

ANITA Premium

Unlimited financial advice and advanced analytics

$9.99/month

Payment Methods

**** **** **** 1234 Visa
)} {activeTab === 'notifications' && (

Notification Preferences

Email Notifications

Receive updates about your financial insights

Push Notifications

Get alerts for important financial updates

Weekly Reports

Receive weekly financial summaries

)} {activeTab === 'privacy' && (

Privacy & Security

Data Export

Download your financial data

Data Import

Import data from other financial apps

Delete Account

Permanently delete your account and all data

)} {activeTab === 'appearance' && (

Appearance

Theme

handleThemeSelect('dark')} >
Dark
handleThemeSelect('light')} >
Light

Accent Color

)}
); }; export default Settings;
